import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.sass'] }) export class HeaderComponent { navs:string[] = [ 'home', 'projects', 'about', 'contact' ] }
